Class WorkflowTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.workflow.structs.WorkflowTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class WorkflowTask
extends Object
    A Workflow task, or job, or process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkflowTask

        public WorkflowTask()

        Default Constructor.

      • WorkflowTask

        @Deprecated
public WorkflowTask(String taskId,
                                String taskName,
                                WorkflowTaskConfiguration taskConfig,
                                List conditions,
                                String taskInstanceClassName,
                                int order)
        Deprecated. 
        This constructor is now deprecated in Apache OODT 0.4, in favor of that explicitly specifies pre- and post- WorkflowConditions. As used, this method will set the pre-conditions via the passed in List of WorkflowConditions only.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The unique ID for this WorkflowTask.
        taskName - The display name for this WorkflowTask.
        taskConfig - The static configuration parameters for this WorkflowTask.
        conditions - The List of conditions attached to this WorkflowTask (if any).
        taskInstanceClassName - The instance class name for this WorkflowTask.
        order - The order in which this WorkflowTask is executed within a Workflow.

      • WorkflowTask

        public WorkflowTask(String taskId,
                    String taskName,
                    WorkflowTaskConfiguration taskConfig,
                    List<WorkflowCondition> preConditions,
                    List<WorkflowCondition> postConditions,
                    List<String> requiredMetFields,
                    String taskInstanceClassName,
                    Date startDate,
                    Date endDate,
                    int order)
        Constructs a new WorkflowTask.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The identifier for this task.
        taskName - The name for this task.
        taskConfig - The associated WorkflowTaskConfiguration.
        requiredMetFields - A List of String met field names that this task requires.
        preConditions - The List of pre-WorkflowConditions.
        postConditions - The List of post-WorkflowConditions.
        taskInstanceClassName - The implementing class name of this WorkflowTask.
        startDate - The time that this task started executing.
        endDate - The time that this task stopped executing.
        order - The order in which this task should be run.

      • getConditions

        @Deprecated
public List getConditions()
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated in favor of using getPreConditions() or getPostConditions(). As called, will return a union of the Tasks's pre- and post- WorkflowConditions.
        Returns:
        A List of WorkflowConditions associated with this task.

      • setConditions

        @Deprecated
public void setConditions(List conditions)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is depcreated in favor of setPostConditions(List) and setPreConditions(List), for explicitly setting the pre or post conditions of this WorkflowTask. To keep back compat, this method in its deprecated form will set the WorkflowTask pre-conditions, as was the case before. Sets the List of WorkflowConditions associated with this task.
        Parameters:
        conditions - The condition List.

      • getOrder

        @Deprecated
public int getOrder()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Returns the order. Don't use this method anymore -- order is not relevant to the control flow which is acutally controlled now by the surrounding workflow model.

      • setOrder

        @Deprecated
public void setOrder(int order)
        Deprecated. 
        Don't use this method anymore -- order is not relevant to the control flow which is acutally controlled now by the surrounding workflow model.
        Parameters:
        order - The order to set.
